idea:
Knit N Knot kids wear is an amalgamation of love, colors, celebration, fun, free- spirit and care that will forever inspire your child to “RISE IN STYLE”.

Knit N Knot is the round the clock companion of kids’ journey from infancy to childhood. Knit N Knot kids wear depicts confidence at every occasion and selfless love for day-to-day fashion. We curate the trendiest head-to-toe look for every youngster, for every moment.
name: SANCHI LIFESTYLE PRIVATE LIMITED

idea: LeadoConnect An Inbound Lead Generation Company as a Service that helps organizations to reduce their investment in sales significantly by leveraging a team of experts who can help the "Brands" to reach out to the relevant target audience, build a Sales Pipeline, and close deals. By working as an extension of your team we can enable you to reach Newer Markets, expand your Target Audience across all industries, create an omnichannel customer engagement program (Clients Pipeline), and help you close deals.
name: LeadoConnect

idea:
Fundgini is a Platform to Attract! Interact! Transact! Business for Professionals, Business Leaders from Corporates, Expert Consultants, Entrepreneurs, Start-up, Niche products and solution providers. On the Platform Showcase Capabilities, Case Studies, References Checks, Background Check. Reach out, Promoter Events, Advertise, Web Sessions, and more.


business


About Company


Business Professionals do need Expert help right from Company Formation, Accounting, Taxation, Back Office Management, Time Management, Order Follow-up, Invoicing and Collection, Finance, Funding, VC, Sales, Delivery, Invoicing, Collection, Positioning, Branding, Press Release, and Writing, Shared Services or Office, Event Management. Special Offers and Discounts for Travel, Hotels, Business Centers, Office Supplies and more.


Vision


Fundgini is aiming to become an umbrella Business Networking Ecosystem and an evolving aggregation place. One Place to seek Expert Help for Corporations, Small and Medium Businesses and Start-ups to find right professionals they could be Experts, Providers of Consulting Services, Large Business Consulting Networks, Mentors, Trainers, or even recruitment.


Make a mark on Social Digital Economy, be a Fundgini!
name: fundgini.com

idea: Green Alliance Agro Private Limited is a Private incorporated on 23 November 2020. It is classified as Non-govt company and is registered at Registrar of Companies, Mumbai. name: GREEN ALLIANCE AGRO PRIVATE LIMITED

idea:
DroneTech Solution Pvt. Ltd is an Indian product and training centered UAV systems firm that develops professional drone solutions for businesses. It was founded in 2021 and is now situated in Mumbai. We want to design, prototype, and manufacture all of our goods in India. Our one-of-a-kind designs are brought to life using the highest-quality materials and cutting-edge production procedures, resulting in a rugged and durable product.

Our major focus will be agriculture, public health, and emergency response, as we want to be a vital player in a variety of verticals for both the commercial and governmental sectors.
name: DRONETECH SOLUTIONS PRIVATE LIMITED
